1112.content:
You slowly wake up to a giant hand and see A familiar face as you. "Well well looks like someone is finally awake!" Said the familiar voice shi turned out to be Courtney. "Courtnet! What are doing!? How about I so small?" You ask as Courtney then placed you on a bed and pinned you on it with her hand. You tried to struggle, but her giant hand was too strong. "Oh don't worry about that, I just felt like I wanted to 'play' with you for awhile little lady." She says to you as she then remove her hand from you and turned around. Before you could he up and run, she sat down on you with her big green butt on your whole tiny body.

"Mmm Mmm" You try to say something and struggle, but you couldn't because of her giant butt smothering you over and over. She also laughed as she did so. "Hahaha, how does it feel to be dominated by me 'little' girl?" She asked you in dominating tone as she then released a small fart on you. "Aaahhh smell it sister!" She demand. You didn't have a choice anyway, you were forced to smell her fart in point plank range. "Does it smell good? Well here's another one 'little' girl!" Courtney said as she released another small fart on your tiny body.

It was then Courtney...

113.content: So there you were in Courtney's boot but there was one thing where was Courtney ? Are you even on Courtney's boot because it might be
113.title: In her boot (Unaware)

1131.content: You look around inside the huge smelly boot the odor almost visibly hovering around you. You notice a large nametag at the top of the boot opening reading "Lindsey". You wonder how such a clean looking girl could have such smelly boots. You walk to one of the walls but trip and fall forward onto the mushy sole foot sweat squishes out of it under your pressure you look up and see...
1131.title: Lindseys

11331.content: You look around the bottom of the boot. You notice the foul smelling aroma and the odd blackness that surrounds you. Looking around you see that the insole was very worn out since you could see heel and toe imprints near the front and back of the boot. You look up and notice a worn out shoe tag on the top if the boot . You could barely read whose it is because of the darkness inside the boot, but you are able to read the word Gwen. That's when you feel a slight tremor and another one that seems to grow more powerful by the second. The trembling becomes so powerful that it bounces you into the air and right back in to the smelly insolemand when you think it can't get any worse it stops right next to the boot. That's when you look up to see Gwen's face with her gothic recognizable black and teal hair. That's when she carries her boot closer to her face thinking she saw you, you shout and scream for her attention , but to your dismay you see her long black socks enter the boot
11331.title: Gwen

choices: Get the pebble out of her boot
113311.content: As you see Gwen's nylon covered toes come closer and closer to you, blocking out the light coming from the mouth of the boot, you are to afraid to move. You watch as her foot moves over head and block out the remaining light. As you watch her nylon covered toes slide past you over head you stand frozen in fear. It isn't until you see her heel that she starts to move her heel downward. That's when you shout one last time for her to hear you, but she doesn't hear you. As your vision is encased with her heel, you slowly begin to feel the pressure bearing down on you. Her nylon covered foot feels soft, but with her weight on you, you feel constrained. She begins to shake her are foot to feel if it fits right. You are shook around under her heel than she plants her foot downward to make sure her foot is secured inside the boot. You feel like you are going to pop, but she doesn't know that and keeps shoving her foot down. As you feel her weight build up more and more you hear Gwen say, "Is there something in my boot"? She than presses down harder to try to identify what you are. Her heel as soft as it is is starting to feel as heavy as a 10 ton boulder. "Is there a pebble in my boot"? She finally noticed you as a pebble in her, boot this gives you some hope as she might take her boot off and get you out and see that you are a person, but your hope is somewhat dashed as you hear her say, but "I already got my boot on should I check it out"? As she decides she starts moving the "pebble" around under her foot. She moves you around in a circular motion under the heel. Than she moves you to the sole of her foot to either push you down some more or rub you into her sole. Than she rests the heel of the boots facin upwards towards the sky. You are moved back down to the heel and it pins you down and starts to move you in a circular motion again. As you are moved towards her sole and pinned down you hear her say, "I mean the pebble feels kinda of squishy and weird, maybe I should take it out, but than again it does feel kind of nice and it's fun to mess around with it." She than starts to rub you in to her sole again, but this time a bit harder than before as she focuses on the "pebble" in her boot. As you feel the nylon covered sole rub into you, you feel like its getting hot inside the boot. Is she sweating? You begin to feel the boot moving upwards a you are about to be moved her heel again you wonder, "How long does it take for someone to decide to take a pebble out of their shoe"? Gwens knows she has another challenge in a few minutes but doesn't know if she should take the pebble out of her boot though. She finally decides to...
113311.title: Hide

choices: A race around  the entire island of Camp Wawanakwa (More feet)
